text: (napiye!) Allah um'mai mannittarulvanaka! (Avarkal um'mutan porukku varatu tankivita unkalitam anumati koriya camayattil) nir en avarkalukku anumatiyalittir? (Anumati alikkatu iruntiruntal avarkalil) unmai colpavarkal (yar enru) umakkut telivaki, (avarkalil) poy colpavarkalai (avarkal yar enpataiyum) nir nanku arintiruppir
